a1: Argentina are good, Rojo is crazy and messy is a legend.
q2: Yes, but when will they win a world cup again?
q3: How far did they get during this past world cup?
q4: They came 2nd in their group and went out in knockout stages.
a4: Perhaps Argentina will get into the final in the next world cup.
q5: Argentina was in the finals in 2014. You really think they have a shot in 2022?
